mapper.sql: id, page_name, request_url, level, machine_id, sequence, is_delete, update_user, update_time, safetyone, safetytwo
mapper.insert: insert into y_page (id, page_name, request_url, level, machine_id, sequence, is_delete, update_user, update_time, safetyone, safetytwo) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update y_page
page_name = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_url = #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update y_page set page_name = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_url = #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update y_page set is_delete = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM y_page WHERE 1 = 1 and is_delete = 1
and page_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
AND machine_id = #{machineId}
